answers.answer:
The physical addresses for the regional centers are: Rădăuți at Str. Perilor nr.2, Rădăuți, județul Suceava; Maramureș at Str. Mihai Viteazu, nr. 11, Satu Mare; and Galați at Str. Săvinești nr.2, Galați, județul Galaţi. Additionally, București is located at Vasile Stolnicu Street, no. 15, Bl.13, sector 2, Bucharest; Timișoara at Str. Armoniei nr.33, Timișoara, judetul Timiș; and Giurgiu at Bulevardul 1907, Giurgiu, județul Giurgiu.

To find detailed information, go to the website https://dopomoha.ro/en/regional-centers-for-procedures-and-accommodation-for-asylum-seekers and read under the section "Regional Centers for Procedures and Accommodation for Asylum Seekers".
